name: Portfolio
description: An engaging front-end web application designed with gamification UI elements to ensure users have a fun experience while learning about my career journey. (React.js, Tailwindcss)

name: E.HUB (Capstone)
description: Web App (CRM) that simplifies corporate event management by centralizing communication between event hosts and managers. (React.js, Tailwindcss, Node.js, Express.js / REST Api)

name: InStock
description: A full-stack web app developed as part of an Agile team to create an Inventory Management System. (React.js, SASS, Node.js, Express.js, Knex.js, SQL)

name: Expense Tracker
description: BrainStation Hackathon (6h): A full-stack web app that allows users add expenses, check the total amount spent, create new categories, and categorize expenses. (React.js, SASS, Node.js, Express.js)

name: Break the Pig Bank
description: BrainStation Hackathon (24h): Front-end web app inspired by the 'Who wants to be a millionaire?' game where users can answer questions and earn 'money'. (HTML, SASS, Vanilla JavaScript, Web API)
technologies: Note: This project was a collaborative effort, with my primary responsibilities focused on the desing, HTML and SASS.
